description:
**Tool Overview**:

The Microsoft Edge (chromium-based) update addresses vulnerabilities present in the underlying Chromium open source software. This tool is critical for maintaining security in Microsoft Edge as it mitigates risks associated with code injection vulnerabilities. 

**Details**:

- This update is released periodically to incorporate the latest security patches from the Chromium project.
- It is imperative to keep Microsoft Edge updated to ensure that you benefit from the latest fixes.
- Users can manually check for updates by navigating to the Edge settings and selecting the update option.
- Automatic updates are typically enabled, but confirmation of the successful application of the latest version can be verified.

For specific details, refer to the Google Chrome release notes, which will include comprehensive information on the patched vulnerabilities and their implications for users of Microsoft Edge (chromium-based).
